<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Enum describing how instructions behave with respect to uniformity and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="comment">/// divergence, to answer the question: if the same instruction is executed by</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="comment">/// two threads in a convergent set of threads, will its result value(s) be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="comment">/// uniform, i.e. the same on both threads?</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae58c751054b01f206f9b9e34e461d25f"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">enum class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae58c751054b01f206f9b9e34e461d25f">InstructionUniformity</a> &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The result values are uniform if and only if all operands are uniform.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
